metadata.title: CVE-2019-0192 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Apache Solr versions 5.0.0 to 5.5.5 and 6.0.0 to 6.6.5, the Config APIallows to configure the JMX server via an HTTP POST request. By pointing itto a malicious RMI server, an attacker could take advantage of Solr'sunsafe deserialization to trigger remote code execution on the Solr side.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
